actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Members of the House of Representatives should use alternative fuel vehicles in their professional and personal lives.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Members of the House should take the lead in reducing the Nation's dependence on foreign oil and promoting innovative energy technologies by using alternative fuel vehicles in their professional and personal lives.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Members of the House of Representatives should use alternative fuel vehicles in their professional and personal lives.
